message: The new Android Studio is based on IntelliJ - which means Kotlin will be widely available to more people to use instead of Java http://blog.jetbrains.com/blog/2013/05/15/intellij-idea-is-the-base-for-android-studio-the-new-ide-for-android-developers/
name: IntelliJ IDEA is the base for Android Studio, the new IDE for Android developers | JetBrains Company
caption: blog.jetbrains.com
description: If you’ve been following Google I/O, Google’s annual developer conference, and you are an Android developer (or plan to be one), then you couldn’t have missed this awesome announcement.
